item.title: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees) problem, 3rd July
item.description:
Please pass to relevant ahr covering this area. Sign post on verge is beginning to rust near the base. Does not move significantly when pushed by hand so does notpose an immediate risk of falling. Please arrange for replacement post to be installed on verge.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Post or sign leaning slightly (less than 20 degrees)

item.title: Signs & cones left behind, 3rd July
item.description:
On the cross road junction 2 cones & 2 signs have been thrown against the verge, left for over a month now - very insightful, unnecessary & not environmentally friendly
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Two Hedges Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Signs & Barriers left behind by Contractor
